channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US Supreme Court hears fight over Trump's power to fire federal agency official
item.description: The court is hearing arguments in Trump v Slaughter - a case that could have major implications for the independence of some federal agencies.

item.title: Paramount Skydance makes $108.4 billion bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount Skydance's $30 per share offer comes just days after Netflix agreed to buy parts of Warner Bros. in a deal valued at $82.7 billion.

item.title: Thieves snatch eight Matisse artworks from library in Brazil
item.description: The thieves enter the library in normal opening hours, stuffing the art works into a canvas bag.

item.title: One hundred abducted schoolchildren released in Nigeria
item.description: Details of the release of the schoolchildren are still unclear and 165 people remain unaccounted for.

item.title: Thousands flee Thai-Cambodia border after deadly clashes
item.description: At least five people have been killed in the most serious confrontation between both sides since July.

item.title: Records reviewed by AP detail online monitoring, arrests in New Orleans immigration crackdown
item.description: State and federal authorities are monitoring online criticism and protests against the immigration crackdown in New Orleans.
